title: Despite uphill battle, Dems roll out bills to address disparities
shortDescription: Democrats know there's little chance the GOP-controlled Congress will pass bills to combat disparities, but pledge to keep pushing.

title: Muslim Americans fear leaving country as Trump travel ban looms
shortDescription: The Trump administration is considering prohibiting or limiting travelers from more than 40 countries from entering the U.S.

title: Trump plans a sweeping round of new tariffs next week: What to know
shortDescription: The president has circled April 2 as the culmination of his "American first" economic policy, which has already shaken markets and started a trade war.

title: Not just Signal: 6 times Trump's security protocols raised eyebrows
shortDescription: Is the Signal security lapse part of a larger pattern under President Donald Trump? Experts say yes.

title: Trump says law firm struck $100 million deal. Others decide to sue
shortDescription: Law firms Jenner & Block and WilmerHale sued the Trump administration over executive orders targeting them, while another firm, Skadden, made a deal.

title: Wisconsin AG sues Elon Musk over payments to voters
shortDescription: Attorney General Josh Kaul took legal action against Elon Musk over the Trump ally's plans to award $1 million checks to two Wisconsin voters.

title: Judge blocks Trump from dismantling Consumer Finance Protection Bureau
shortDescription: Judge Amy Berman Jackson issued a preliminary injunction to stop Trump's administration from dismantling the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau.

title: Federal court lets Trump remove Dems from labor boards, for now
shortDescription: Donald Trump can – for now – remove Democratic members from two federal labor boards, a federal appeals court ruled in a victory for Trump.

title: Trump pardons three founders of BitMEX cryptocurrency exchange
shortDescription: Trump pardoned three founders of the BitMEX cryptocurrency exchange.

title: US judge blocks Trump administration from fast-tracking deportations
shortDescription: The temporary restraining order is aimed at protecting migrants from deportation to countries other than those identified in immigration proceedings.

title: Trump: No need to speed car buying to dodge tariffs on imports
shortDescription: Trump says Americans don't need to speed car purchases to dodge 25% tariffs on imports beginning April 2 because the economy will 'boom.'

title: Trump administration moves to fire remaining USAID staff
shortDescription: USAID staff were informed of the decision by an internal memo from Jeremy Lewin, a member of billionaire Elon Musk’s job-slashing DOGE.

title: Wisconsin Republicans back bid to limit judges' power to block Trump
shortDescription: Wisconsin Republicans including Sen. Ron Johnson, Reps. Derrick Van Orden and Tom Tiffany back efforts to limit federal judges' power to thwart Trump.

title: Trump pardons Nikola founder Trevor Milton, convicted of fraud in 2022
shortDescription: President Trump issued a full and unconditional pardon for Trevor Milton, founder of Nikola Corp., that erases his 2022 fraud conviction.

title: Why Elon Musk just gave away $1 million to a Wisconsin voter
shortDescription: Musk took to X to announce that "Scott A." from Green Bay had won the sum for signing Musk's "Petition In Opposition To Activist Judges."
